title: 96/318/EC: Commission Decision of 20 December 1995 refusing France's application for protective measures with regard to pharmaceutical products coming from Spain (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 20 December 1995 refusing France's application for protective measures with regard to pharmaceutical products coming from Spain (Only the French text is authentic) (96/318/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The application for safeguard measures made by France under Article 379 of the Act of Accession, aimed at refusing the import into France of pharmaceutical products coming from Spain, which are protected by a product patent in France but not in Spain, is rejected.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 December 1995.
For the Commission
Mario MONTI
Member of the Commission
